function.signature: JMVC.factory(String type, String name[, Array params])
function.description: Get a Model, View or Interface

params.param: specify the kind of object should be returned, accepted values area 'view', 'model', 'controller' and 'interface'

the name for the object, that will be used in the xhr path. Will be searched in the Models dir, so is possible to use a relative path as objects/person to get the model within the /app/models/objects/person.js file
all parameters for the object constructor call
